author: Belinda Ang Saw Ean J:
casename: UCO Bank v Golden Shore Transportation Pte Ltd
counsel: Bazul Ashhab (T S Oon and Bazul) for the plaintiff; Toh Kian Sing and John Seow (Rajah and Tann) for the defendant
tags: Admiralty and Shipping/Bills of lading/Bills of lading as contract of carriage
tags-parsed: Admiralty and Shipping/Bills of lading/Bills of lading as contract of carriage/Plaintiff bringing action under contracts of carriage against defendant/Bills of lading not indorsed by shippers before delivery/Whether plaintiff entitled to bring actions under contracts of carriage/Whether plaintiff lawful holder of bills of lading/Section 5(2) Bills of Lading Act (Cap 384, 1994 Rev Ed)
